post.name: Sue Vileikis
post.comments:
I met Clint at NOW Foods about 10 years ago and I will never forget him. I remember Clint at the office as being very energetic and always happy!
I also worked with Clint a little bit outside of NOW Foods teaching English to a family who needed help. Clint was always doing something to make life a little better for someone else.
May the grace and peace of Jesus be upon the family.
